title: Use same UIImage with multiple theme base app by just applying UIColor to UIImage instance as following.

inline_content.Text: Use same UIImage with multiple theme base app by just applying UIColor to UIImage instance as following.

title: Now lets say you want to do same with UIImageView then use following code

inline_content.Text: Now lets say you want to do same with UIImageView then use following code

title:
[imageView setImage:imgMenu]; // Assign UIImage to UIImageView
[imageView setTintColor:[UIColor greenColor]]; // Change imageview image color to green.
[imageView setTintColor:[UIColor redColor]]; // Change imageview image color to red.

content_resolved.code:
[imageView setImage:imgMenu]; // Assign UIImage to UIImageView
[imageView setTintColor:[UIColor greenColor]]; // Change imageview image color to green.
[imageView setTintColor:[UIColor redColor]]; // Change imageview image color to red.
